title: Personal Website + Blog
description: The site you are looking at right now! It was originally built using Jekyll but I rebuilt it with Gatsby + React during quarantine to make my website load faster and make it easier to develop more features for my blog. Enjoy my drawing of myself â€” and please, don't comment on the teeth.

title: Real Time Chat App
description: A multi-person real-time private messaging chat application. A registered user can send messages privately to any user who is also registered and the recipient receives the message in real time if they are logged in. Works like any messaging chat application (iMessage, Messenger, etc).

title: Lyrical Notes
description: A guessing game from listening to a 30 second preview of a song from Spotify

title: Mapping Visualization
caption: Internship @ Kupenda for the Children
description: An interactive map with a filter based on user-selected properties and a feature that allows the user to find the closest facilities from any marker. Demo with mock data

title: Creative Learning Tool
caption: UROP @ MIT Media Lab (Lifelong Kindergarten Group)
description: A creative learning tool to help educators/teachers lesson plan in a more creative and interactive way, since current tools do not address the issues that they face.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript (jQuery, Node.js, EJS), MongoDB, Mongoose

title: Open Streets
caption: MLH Best Use of MongoDB Winner @ TechTogether Boston Hackathon
description: A crowdsourcing platform that promotes more clean, connected, and collaborative communities by allowing users to post issues on a map, share details, and automatically update the dates and addresses of the posts.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript (jQuery, Node.js, EJS, Leaflet.js), Nominatim, MongoDB, Mongoose

title: Machine Learning Research
caption: Regeneron STS Scholar (formerly Intel Science Talent Search Semifinalist)
description: A machine learning model to predict the locations of proteins using image processing, ensemble learning, and CNNs; aimed at drug repurposing for protein dysfunctional diseases (cancer, asthma, Alzheimer's, etc). I submitted a 14 page research paper to Regeneron STS 2019 (formerly Intel Science Talent Search Semifinalist) and was named one of the 300 Scholars out of 1,964 total entrants.
